Content: Long ago bike and scooter rider. Came across this 1987 BMW K 75 C model that needs some work but believe it can be a nice way to return to the road. Appreciate any advice related to finding a 22 mm handlebar to fit this bike. Would anybody know if the one I did find which is 23 1/2 inches will work -since I have found the original should be about 24 3/4 inches. Thanks. Look forward to updating you as the work is completed.
